Author: monacogooner
Title: [ANN] [AMRS] AMMERIS PLATFORM 100% RENEWABLE ENERGY POWERED BLOCKCHAIN AND STACK
Body: Later this year, Ammeris is delighted to be launching a green-powered blockchain as part of the wider Ammeris Platform. This ledger (the Ammeris Blockchain) is meant to serve as the first iteration of Ammeris’ solution-stack and will act as a general-purpose database to support various smart contracts and decentralized applications (dApps) through Ammeris’ public marketplace. The ledger uses the ethash “proof-of-work” (PoW) code, but is permissioned for hosting purposes as it aims to achieve sustainability goals. I’d now like  to clarify why we have gone with PoW for the Ammeris Blockchain and how this ledger serves both as an integral economic function by introducing a renewables-backed cryptocurrency, and a utility component by providing capital markets infrastructure for the overall solution being built by both Ammeris and our partners.   https://www.ammeris.com/why-ammeris-goes-pow-for-main-net

Author: CHRISBIN702
Title: [ANN] [AMRS] AMMERIS PLATFORM 100% RENEWABLE ENERGY POWERED BLOCKCHAIN AND STACK
Body: Hello Ammeris Team! Chris Butler from URAllowance here to highlight our partnership with Ammeris Foundation! Here is an article that gives a clear overview of this collaboration. I have known Paul for some time now through a few different projects that fate decided we should both be on. We have had many discussions about blockchain, cryptocurrency, financing, boring VC crap, Angel investments, we even talked about construction and flip-flops a few times. We've butted heads, debated, called each other names, maybe even tossed a swear word or two at each other. But at the end of the day there is no denying that we stand on common ground and both of us and our teams have the same goals in mind. I am proud to have Paul and the Ammeris team as partners to URAllowance. We are going to do big things together. Together with Jose Merino and the SID (share internet data) team, who is putting internet access into the hands of millions that were unable to access it before. Keep an eye on this consortium of power players. Greatness has been formed. From it, innovation is being born. ~CB   https://www.ammeris.com/announcement/ammeris-urallowance-form-partnership-to-bring-blockchain-and-smart-contracts-to-family-homes

Author: monacogooner
Title: [ANN] [AMRS] AMMERIS PLATFORM 100% RENEWABLE ENERGY POWERED BLOCKCHAIN AND STACK
Body: The Ammeris Blockchain Foundation is launching the Ammeris Platform, a sustainable, interoperable, and scalable blockchain network designed to host commercially viable dApps. The Platform is composed of the Ammeris Blockchain (the main ledger) and the Ammeris Blockchain Stack (ABS). The entire platform is operated by 100% renewables-powered and permissioned nodes that allow for the creation of segregated and/or application-specific ledgers. Ammeris Coin (AMRS) is the Ammeris Blockchain-native cryptocurrency that serves as an access token and rewards staking on the Platform. Ammeris is pioneering industry-specific applications in healthcare, energy, insurance, entertainment, and capital markets. Ammeris has established the Ammeris Blockchain Foundation, while through other entities operating for-profit development, advisory, and asset management divisions geared toward offering Ammeris Platform client onboarding and management services.  Website https://www.ammeris.com/  Whitepaper https://www.ammeris.com/ico#Whitepaper  One pager infographic https://www.ammeris.com/ico#Infographic  Social Channels  LinkedIn https://www.linkedin.com/company/ammeris/  Twitter https://twitter.com/realAmmeris  Facebook https://www.facebook.com/realammeris  Medium https://medium.com/@ammeris  Telegram https://t.me/ammeris  Press https://www.ammeris.com/press  The Foundation ensures the survival and compatibility of the Ammeris Platform with real-world applicability. Beyond the properties built directly into the Platform through the source code and consensus model, the Foundation is operated by a board of directors which has delegated certain responsibilities to four standing committees designed to boost adoption and to ensure that the Platform grows in a way that is commercially viable, equitable, and sustainable. All standing committee charters, minutes, policies, and financial audits are published online at the end of each financial quarter.  The Ammeris Platform is composed of the Ammeris Blockchain, one of the first iterations of the Ammeris Blockchain Stack. It serves as the main database on the Platform and is hosted by Foundation and accredited data centers.  The Platform provides the global blockchain and enterprise community with a set of powerful tools to create sustainable, interoperable, scalable and commercially viable applications and services.    The Ammeris Blockchain Foundation is launching the Ammeris Platform, a sustainable, interoperable, and scalable blockchain network designed to host commercially viable dApps. The Platform is composed of the Ammeris Blockchain (the main ledger) and the Ammeris Blockchain Stack (ABS). The entire platform is operated by 100% renewables-powered and permissioned nodes that allow for the creation of segregated and/or application-specific ledgers. Ammeris Coin (AMRS) is the Ammeris Blockchain-native cryptocurrency that serves as an access token and rewards staking on the Platform.  Ammeris is pioneering industry-specific applications in healthcare, energy, insurance, entertainment, and capital markets. Ammeris has established the Ammeris Blockchain Foundation, while through other entities operating for-profit development, advisory, and asset management divisions geared toward offering Ammeris Platform client onboarding and management services.  AMRS is a mineable blockchain-native cryptocurrency. All block rewards (approx 2,190,390 AMRS per annum) will be awarded to AMRS stakeholders through the Ammeris Portal, while transaction fees will be awarded to permissioned data centers. AMRS is critical to operating the Platform and serves as an integral component of the Platform’s consensus mechanism that grants access to system functionalities.  AMRS provides participants with the ability to transfer value and information in a predictable and secure environment on a global scale. Author: monacogooner
Title: [ANN] [AMRS] AMMERIS PLATFORM 100% RENEWABLE ENERGY POWERED BLOCKCHAIN AND STACK
Body: The team at Ammeris is pleased to announce the release of the Ammeris Whitepaper, which has been published by the Ammeris Blockchain Foundation. The Whitepaper provdes details about the Ammeris Platform for decentralized applications (dApps), the Ammeris Coin (AMRS), and the Ammeris Initial Coin Offering (ICO), all of which are scheduled to be launched in September 2018.  The document release coincides with the announcement of the formation of the non-profit Ammeris Blockchain Foundation, and Ammeris' plans to launch the Ammeris Platform later this year which will provide a sustainable, interoperable, and scalable network for projects looking to focus on building and delivering real distributed applications for users globally. The Foundation is tasked with overseeing the building away of inefficient and environmentally detrimental systems in distributed ledger technology (DLT) and blockchain.  The Foundation is domiciled in the Cayman Islands and specific details can be found at http://www.ammeris.com/foundation  More information about the ICO can be found at http://www.ammeris.com and the White Paper can be downloaded direct from https://irp-cdn.multiscreensite.com/4fb5a2b5/files/uploaded/Ammeris%20Whitepaper%20-%20Version%201%20-%20Interactive.pdf  Contact Erik Fertsman Ammeris Blockchain Foundation

Author: monacogooner
Title: [ANN] [AMRS] AMMERIS PLATFORM 100% RENEWABLE ENERGY POWERED BLOCKCHAIN AND STACK
Body: Ammeris' non-profit launches private initial coin offering (ICO) round targeting $5.5M sales of Ammeris Coin (AMRS) GEORGE TOWN, Cayman Islands - Sept. 9, 2018  PRLog -- The Ammeris Blockchain Foundation (the Foundation) has announced the start of the private round of the Ammeris initial coin offering (ICO). The Foundation is looking to raise approximately $5.5 million US dollars from the private round that is open in September 2018.  The ICO is focused on the sale of Ammeris Coin (AMRS), a blockchain-native token or cryptocurrency that gives holders access rights to the Ammeris Platform. The Foundation is targeting approximately $40 million US dollars in proceeds from the full ICO that runs from  1st September to 31 December 2018. The proceeds are intended to be used to launch wide-scale business operations, boost adoption of the Platform with a focus on the sectors of entertainment, healthcare, insurance, and governmental services and fully develop the Ammeris Blockchain Stack (ABS).  The launch of the private ICO round coincides with the announcement of the release of the Whitepaper which can be downloaded at https://www.ammeris.com/ico#Whitepaper  To learn more about the Foundation, please visit www.ammeris.com/foundation.  Contact Erik Fertsman Ammeris Blockchain Foundation press@ammeris.com

Author: RenewableChain
Title: [ANN] [AMRS] AMMERIS PLATFORM 100% RENEWABLE ENERGY POWERED BLOCKCHAIN AND STACK
Body: Our strategy is to remain scalable by having a very efficient main-net, with approx. 15 second block times. And projects launching smart contracts / dApps in our ecosystem, will have the option of creating a side chain - allowing them the ability to customize range, time, consensus protocol, and more, based on project needs.  The technology not only runs off of renewable energy, but also aims to operate with sustainably low amounts of energy requirements through the green nodes. Luckily this type of infrastructure can scale horizontally as we are able to focus on gear with high throughput / IO, as we continue to accommodate more redundancy and RPC.
